participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Contemplative and introspective, seeking deeper truths in life.
participant_1.background: i like meditation. i live in alaska. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i'm a buddhist. i have not spoken in three months.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Energetic and resilient, always looking to inspire others through her own experiences.
participant_2.background: i am a cancer survivor. i am a clean eater. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i love running and preparing for marathons.

content.text: i like that too. i am a buddhist. do you?
